title: Stitch Fix earnings top Street view, revenue doesn't
text: Stitch Fix Inc. SFIX, +4.21% shares flipped between gains and losses in the extended session Tuesday after the online fashion stylist site topped Wall Street estimates for earnings but not for revenue. Stitch Fix shares initially dropped as much as 11% after hours and were last up 2%, following a 4.2% rise in the regular session to close at $20.06. The company reported fiscal fourth-quarter net income of $7.2 million, or 7 cents a share, compared with $18.2 million, or 18 cents a share, in the year-ago period. Revenue rose to $432.1 million from $318.3 million in the year-ago quarter. Analysts surveyed by FactSet had forecast earnings of 4 cents a share on revenue of $432.4 million.
description: Stitch Fix Inc. shares flipped between gains and losses in the extended session Tuesday after the online fashion stylist site topped Wall Street estimates...
